zh.title: N7綫推行雙向分段收費
zh.content: 絲巴自2025年12月10日起，於N7綫新增雙向分段收費，讓深宵往返市中心、卡城與維拉的乘客享有更靈活的選擇。詳情請前往巴士路綫頁面並選擇N7，或按此。

en.title: N7 Implements Two-way Sectional Fare
en.content: From 10 December 2025, StarTone Transport implements two-way sectional fares on route N7, providing more flexible fare options for passengers travelling between Downtown, Katadelpia and Vayler at overnight. Refer to Bus Route page and select N7 for details, or click here.
